# Abstract

This project was completed using data from Multnomah County regarding cancer deaths. We selected ethnicity and race as our variables of interest because they are important to keep in mind when considering other factors that are more directly related to cancer mortalityâ€”such as geography and economic status. People of color have been discriminated against throughout the history of the Multnomah County area and thus this project aims to render visible those who have long been considered easy to overlook.
